Description: A reference to the :doc:`Container <../Container>` object that the symbol is being added to

List, vector of domains given either as a string (``"*"`` for :doc:`universe set <../../user_guide/additional_features/universe_set>` ) or as a reference to a Set object, an empty domain list will create a scalar variable

Flag or a vector of flags that forces variable elements to be recursively included in corresponding parent sets (i.e., :doc:`implicit set definition <../../user_guide/additional_features/implicit_set_growth>` )
